note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Smoke.js += Animate.css
tagline: framework-agnostic styled alert system for javascript with the animation power of Animate.css
body:
###Animated Mobile || Desktop || Tablet Messaging Javascript Framework 
I've combined the power of [Smoke.js](http://ssssnakes.com/smoke/) with the amazing animation library from [Animate.css](http://daneden.me/animate/). Bundled here for your enjoyment.

***

###Example 
`smoke.signal('Saved!', { timeout: 3000, animate: { in:'bounceIn', out:'bounceOut' } });`
